sentence.Network_en: Sister Francesca entered the chapel, took her seat, and promptly fell asleep.
sentence.Network_cn: 弗朗西丝卡修女走进小教堂，坐下来，很快就睡着了。

sentence.Network_en: The company's shares promptly fell by 300 lire on the stock market.
sentence.Network_cn: 该公司在股市上的股价迅即跌了300里拉。

sentence.Network_en: The cells will promptly start to soak up moisture.
sentence.Network_cn: 细胞会立即开始吸收水分。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新概念英语第二册46---68课课文_百度知道 ... glance v. 扫视 promptly adv. 迅速地 ride  n. 旅行.
考博英语词汇 ... promotion n． 促进；提升；创立 promptly ad. 立即 propaganda n． 宣传；宣传机构.
连字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 连袂〖 joinsleeves〗 连忙〖 promptly;atonce〗 连蒙带骗〖 surmiseandcheat〗.
《Friends》词汇表B ... panther n. 豹, 黑豹 promptly adv. 敏捷地, 迅速地 insect n. 昆虫, 卑鄙的人.

list.abs: if any representative or person employed by the Contractor in accordance with GCC Sub-Clause 17.2.5 , the Contractor shall , where required , promptly appoint a replacement .如承包人的任何代表或雇用人员根据17.2.6款被撤离，承包人应根据要求立即指派另一个员接替他的工作。
美国服装护理标准chinese-english... ... 稍强脱水 permanet press 迅速移开 remove promptly 不加热滚筒干燥 tumble dry no heat.
"promptly"怎么说合适... ... promptly Customer 立即; pay promptly 快速付款; 按期付款; PROMP Promptly 迅速地.
when we got aboard again and made sail , the wind promptly died away .当我们再度登船启航时，风突然停了下来。

entry.def: If you do something promptly, you do it immediately.

example.ex: Sister Francesca entered the chapel, took her seat, and promptly fell asleep.
example.tran: 弗朗西丝卡修女走进小教堂，坐下来，很快就睡着了。

entry.def: If you do something promptly at a particular time, you do it at exactly that time.

example.ex: Promptly at a quarter past seven, we left the hotel.
example.tran: 我们于7点一刻准时离开了宾馆。

means.word_mean: 3. at once (usually modifies an undesirable occurrence);

auth_sentence.content: He definitely wants his dinner promptly served at seven.
auth_sentence.res_content: He definitely wants his dinner promptly served at seven.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He definitely wants his dinner promptly served at seven.

auth_sentence.content: He promptly inked a multiple nonexclusive contract with Universal.
auth_sentence.res_content: He promptly inked a multiple nonexclusive contract with Universal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He promptly inked a multiple nonexclusive contract with Universal.

auth_sentence.content: Having sacked the party's...chairman, he promptly reinstated him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Having sacked the party's...chairman, he promptly reinstated him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Having sacked the party's...chairman, he promptly reinstated him.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加
instant立即的;紧迫的+ly……地→adv.立即地,即刻地
like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短+ly……地→adv.立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
sufficient足够的+ly……地→adv.十分地,充分地

unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地
uniform贯的,一致的+ly……地→adv.一律地,均一地

month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

Sentence.sentence: Responding promptly to accidents and other emergencies is important, but it is their smallest job.

sentences.en: A call for 100 bottles of blood was answered promptly.
sentences.cn: 征求100瓶血液的呼吁很快得到了回应。

sentences.en: Corbett leaned against the wall and promptly vomited.
sentences.cn: 科比特倚在墙边， 马上呕吐了起来。

sentences.en: He paid the money back promptly.
She promptly seized the opportunity his absence gave her.
sentences.cn: 她立即抓住了因他不在场给她创造的机会。

sentences.en: She appears promptly at eight each day.
